Query:	SELECT u.user_id, u.username, COUNT(t.topic_poster) num_topics
	FROM phpbb_users u, phpbb_topics t
	WHERE (t.topic_poster <> -1) AND (u.user_posts > 0) AND (u.user_id = t.topic_poster)

	LIMIT 10
